content: HomeBlogSigal Berezin Sales Intel. Content Manager at Similarweb Sigal Berezin Sigal is the content marketing manager for the Similarweb Sales Solution. An avid storyteller, she loves to weave data and insights into her work, bringing technology, data and communications to life. She holds a degree in Communications from Universidad Adolfo Ibáñez, and an MA in Security & Diplomacy from Tel Aviv University. In her free time, you can find Sigal deep in a book, traveling, spending time with her family and exploring Tel Aviv.
